namespace.dldescription: URI identifier for the source of the animal identifier

identifier.dldescription: a unique value for the given identifier for the animal

state.dldescription: State of the animalId (birth, current, historic)

identifierType.dldescription: Type of animal identifer. Each animal identifier SHOULD  also specify the type of identifier (Official, Management, Electronic, Tattoo, Brand, Calculated) so that a receiving system which is unable to interpret namespaces may use a generic method to interpret the identifier.
